title: Short play showcase: The New tenant
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Larry Yust
brief_description: Eugene Ionesco’s play “The New tenant”, is a classic example of Theatre of the Absurd. The play expresses Ionesco’s sense of the ambiguity and incoherence of much of modern life, especially big-city life. Cast includes Paul Schumacher, Eve McVeagh, Carl Byrd, John Crawford.
